verbs.description: [ARG1: pittsburg man] [V: upset] after breakup lied to fbi about mass shooting plot by ex - girlfriend a pittsburg man pleaded guilty friday to lying to federal bureau of investigation agents that his ex - girlfriend and her brother were planning a high school shooting in the east bay alex tse federal aviation administration pittsburg united states attorney alex tse lauren hernández fbi moses orozco national association of hispanic journalists federal bureau of investigation
